Built with

Honestly, I made this starter for myself, based on how I want to start a project and how I like to organize everything. I am delighted that so many of you find it useful too! This is a list of sites based on / built with Eleventy Excellent. This uses Eleventy's screenshot API . New screenshots are fetched in development only.

Have you built a site with this starter? Please let me know or create a pull request and add it to the list! Add your data in src/_data/builtwith.json, then run npm run screenshots to add or update the screenshots.

Based on, or built with Eleventy Excellent:

Joe writes

Joe works on the Technical Content team at Starburst Data and contribute to the Trino OSS project.

joewrites.io

deimidis.me

Notes from a world half a century old

deimidis.me

eimearsweeney.com

Website for Eimear, a qualified executive and team coach working in Big Tech.

eimearsweeney.com built by Lene

Misremembered

Misremembered is the brain-child of Jon Michaels, a long-time sound editor, maker of tacos, and generally tech-minded fellow

misremembe.red

Refugio Libertad

Organisation of workers in the popular economy who live in rural areas in Córdoba (Argentina).

refugio.libre.org.ar

Esther Zecco

Official website of Esther Zecco. Singer and songwriter of pop music from Segovia with influences of American folk and country.

estherzecco.com built by Lene

thescalableway.com

The Scalable Way is a professional services agency bringing software engineering practices to data platforms.

thescalableway.com built by Lene

Colegio Marpe Ciudad Jardín

Website for a primary school in Las Palmas.

colegiomarpeciudadjardin.com built by Lene

dexterouslogic.com

Stephen writes native software for iOS, Mac, Android, and also the web, releasing it under the name Dexterous Logic.

www.dexterouslogic.com

data-bene.io

Data-Bene specializes in providing expert PostgreSQL services.

www.data-bene.io built by Lene

fLaMEdFURY

Personal website of 'fLaMEd'. Thoughts about the current and past state of the web.

flamedfury.com

camperotacti.co

Alberto is a game developer and tech enthusiast from Spain, working as a gameplay programmer.

www.camperotacti.co

badwebsites.rip

I colaborate with Berlin-based designer Daniela Grau to develop human centered websites.

badwebsites.rip built by Lene

Manu Clavijo

Manu Clavijo is an experienced violinist who also performs his own repertoire of songs as a singer-songwriter

www.manuclavijo.com built by Lene

chrismcleod.dev

A a software developer with over 20 years of work experience.

chrismcleod.dev

Lene Saile

My personal site! Really, this website came before the starter, and I built the starter based on it.

www.lenesaile.com built by Lene

albertoballesteros.com

Website of Alberto Ballesteros, spanish singer-songwriter. I highly recommend listening in! :)'

www.albertoballesteros.com built by Lene

embedded-data.de

Ready2use Softwareframework for IIoT for embedded / edge to cloud applications.

embedded-data.de/en/

lene.dev

My developer profile. I occasinally try new CSS features here.

www.lene.dev built by Lene

buerokratiemonster.eu

The "bureaucracy monsters" are misunderstood. Without them, there is no rule of law, environmental protection or human rights. buerokratiemonster.eu gives them a voice.

buerokratiemonster.eu/en/ built by Lene

Project MB

Personal website of Nicole. Writes about productivity, PKM, team happiness, agile, technology..

www.projectmb.com

cybercultural.com

A newsletter about internet history and its impact on our culture, by Richard MacManus.

cybercultural.com

Old man yelling at tech

Former software engineer turned manager rediscovers his love for coding and infrastructure.

krgr.dev

FigCat

FigCat is a repository of lists of creative works, games, and other items, compiled by hand from various sources.

figcat.com

claytonerrington.com

Currently an AWS Technical Engineer who finds writing things down to be a valuable tool.

claytonerrington.com

httpster.io

httpster's personal website. Silly articles, rants, art and everything in between.

httpster.io

ELAN

Demo project for a fictional Berlin-based event agency.

elan.maltebaer.vercel.app

cantautor.es

cantautor.es is a place where you can listen to excerpts of selected songs from Spanish singer-songwriters.

cantautor.es built by Lene

The Wooden Chips Handyman Service

A a website for local virginia handyman built with Netlify CMS and 11ty

thewoodenchips.com

lamusicoteca.com

Very cool music school in Chamartín, Madrid. All music styles, all levels.

lamusicoteca.com built by Lene
